desc: I am a frontend engineer. I want to become a developer that various colleagues such as planners, designers, and backend developers can feel comfortable with.
I studied Spanish at university. This has had a huge impact on the way I am now.
I studied Marketing as a minor. I am always thinking about 'value to deliver for consumers', which is the basis of marketing.
I want to grow as an international regional expert. The ultimate goal is to develop programs that help solve the world's problems.
